meanings.definition: To transmit or broadcast a program on television through cable.
meanings.sent1: The local news station cablecasts the weather report every evening.
meanings.sent2: The cable company cablecasts a variety of channels for its subscribers.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show cablecasts a hilarious skit about a clumsy magician.
meanings.sent4: Her smile cablecasts joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The documentary cablecasts the beauty of nature in stunning detail.

meanings.definition: The act of broadcasting a program on television through cable.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching cablecasts of cooking shows on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The cablecasts of the sports events are always in high definition.
meanings.sent3: The cablecasts of the talent show brought laughter and cheers from the audience.
meanings.sent4: His artwork cablecasts emotions that words cannot express.
meanings.sent5: The cablecasts of the music concert made me feel like I was there in person.
